page.title: 01AN OVERVIEW OF THE AREA.
page.content: The greater part of this block is agricultural land, consisting mainly of rough grazing and crops for animal feed.The two main villages,Etwall and Hilton,are bisected by the main Stoke to Derby road,the A516. There is no heavy industry in this area.Many of the people who live in either of the two villages commute to work in Derby or Burton. There are two primary schools and one comprehensive school,each with its own swimming pool. Both Etwall and Hilton have a thriving community spirit.
